A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know what everyone's problem is. I loved it (38\, lifelong Star Wars fan. I have tattoos...)\, my wife loved it (passive fan)\, my kids loved it (11 and 13). Like any movie\, it's not perfect\, but it's new and different. If you're not one of those fans that just wants more of the same\, you'll enjoy it too.
